title: Dusk of Dawn - repetition of impossible

content.prompt: The speaker uses the word "impossible" twice at the beginning of the final paragraph in order to

choices.label: return to the writing style used in the first paragraph of the essay
explore the development of a logical argument
imply that all impossibilities are created by humans
highlight the strong feelings that the subject engenders

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how the organization of a text creates unity and coherence and reflects a line of reasoning.
